text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has now been updated: https://t.co/XhspoyTG79

On Saturday 6 February 2021, 18,262 new cases and 828 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the UK.

A total of 11,465,210 people have now received the first dose of a #vaccine. https://t.co/kGYy2R8CKV
